name: CentropeMAP Cross-Border Geoportal
description: CentropeMAP is a geoportal connecting the region by collecting web map services (WMS) from all Centrope member regions in one single map viewer, allowing cross-border spatial analysis with multiple data layers for regional planning and related fields.
owner_subregion_name: Lower Austria, Vienna, South Moravia, Győr-Moson-Sopron Region, Bratislavský, Trnavský, Nitriansky
